entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
